title: Dream of the Red Chamber
summary: Dream of the Red Chamber (Honglou Meng) or The Story of the Stone (Shitou Ji), composed by Cao Xueqin, is one of Chinese literature's Four Great Classical Novels. It was written in the middle of the 18th century during the Qing dynasty. The novel is believed to be semi-autobiographical, mirroring the rise and decline of author Cao Xueqin's own family and, by extension, of the Qing dynasty.[1]
